examples.example: 妈妈用火腿为我做了一顿美味的三明治，我吃得很开心。

translate.english: Mother made a delicious sandwich for me with ham, and I ate very happily.

examples.example: 我去超市买了些火腿，准备回家给家人做一顿丰盛的晚餐。

translate.english: I went to the supermarket to buy some hams and was ready to go home to make a sumptuous dinner for my family.

examples.example: 好朋友给我带来了一些火腿，我们一起愉快地分享。

translate.english: Good friends brought me some hams and we shared them happily together.
